BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST SET STR_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_NAME=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=?
UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=?

INSERT INTO EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ACTBUD_SUB_DIVISION_MST T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_SUBDIV_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTBUD_SUB_DIVISION_MST SET NUM_DEPT_ID=?,NUM_DIV_ID=?,STR_SUBDIV_CODE=?,STR_SUBDIV_NAME=?,STR_SUBDIV_INCHARGE=?,STR_LOCATION=?,STR_EMP_NO=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_SUBDIV_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTBUD_SUB_DIVISION_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_SUBDIV_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTBUD_SUB_DIVISION_MST T SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_SUBDIV_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
